description:
Fire and the gang move further within the Tree of the Wind in order to confront Demon King Nanawarai!  However Harpyja and Silver Dragon stand in the way!  Mayuyu also puts up a fight with his Dragon God Kukulkan!  A fierce battle between dragons is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 電撃進化! ククルカン!
